## Discussion

In iOS, tvOS, and watchOS this resolves to the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/ToolbarRole/navigationStack] role. In macOS, this resolves to the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/ToolbarRole/editor] role.

# automatic

**Type Property**

The automatic role.

## Declaration

```swift
static var automatic: ToolbarRole { get }
```

## Discussion

In iOS, tvOS, and watchOS this resolves to the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/ToolbarRole/navigationStack] role. In macOS, this resolves to the [doc://com.apple.SwiftUI/documentation/SwiftUI/ToolbarRole/editor] role.
title: automatic
